sources.title: Hold Your Breath | Full Horror Thriller Movie
sources.description:
Hold Your Breath - A group of friends on a weekend camping trip find themselves being picked off one by one when one member of the group refuses to abide by the urban myth that you can breathe in evil spirits when passing cemeteries.
2012. Stars: Katrina Bowden, Randy Wayne, Erin Marie Hogan

metadata.Plot: In 1930s Oklahoma amid the region's horrific dust storms, a woman is convinced that a sinister presence is threatening her family.
metadata.Actors: Sarah Paulson, Amiah Miller, Alona Jane Robbins
